abstract: Stock indexes close slightly lower after spending most of day wavering between small gains and losses.
lead_paragraph: Indexes drifted a day after a sell-off prompted by worries about higher U.S. interest rates and a stronger dollar. The euro fell to its lowest level in 12 years.

headline.main: Market Inches Lower, Stabilizing a Day After a Big Drop

snippet: Indexes drifted a day after a sell-off prompted by worries about higher U.S. interest rates and a stronger dollar. The euro fell to its lowest level in 12 years.
